Nri kichel (Yiddish: קיכל, otutu kichlach קיכלעך, obere nke קוכ kukhn "cake") bụ ihe na-atọ ụtọ ma ọ bụ kuki na nri ndị Juu
A na-eji àkwá, ntụ ọka, na shuga eme ya, a na-afụkọta ntụ ọka ahụ ma belata ya n'ụdị ụta.

Nri Kichel a kwadebere maka azụmahịa bụ achịcha kpọrọ nkụ, nke yiri ụta na-acha shuga. A na-ejikarị ha eme ihe na kiddush n'ụlọ nzukọ mgbe ozi Shabbat gasịrị ma bụrụkwa ihe oriri na-ewu ewu na Rosh Hashanah.

Kichlach yiri ka ọ mepụtara na etiti ma ọ bụ n'ebe ọwụwa anyanwụ Europe na obodo ndị Juu Ashkenazi site na narị afọ nke iri na itoolu ma mesịa bụrụ onye a ma ama gburugburu ụwa na diaspora na mbata na narị afọ iri abụọ. Kiddush na mmalite narị afọ nke iri abụọ nke ụlọ nzukọ Ashkenazi dị gburugburu kichlach, pickled herring, na schnapps. Ndị Juu nọ na South Africa ka na-enye kichel na herring a pịrị apị, nke bụkwa ihe a na-emekarị n'ụlọ nzukọ ndị America ruo n'afọ 1950. A na-eri Kichlach mgbe ụfọdụ na ụdị ọzọ na-atọ ụtọ ma ọ bụ na-eri ya.

N'ihi ìhè ha, ikuku ha, a na-akpọ kuki "nothings" mgbe ụfọdụ. Kichlach nwere aha ọma maka ịbụ kuki kpọrọ nkụ ma na-etinye ya na ihe ọṅụṅụ na-ekpo ọkụ dịka tii. Mgbe a kwadebere ya na nri matzah kama ntụ ọka, a pụrụ iri kichlach n'oge ezumike Ista.
